duties_responsibilities.duty: Participation in standing Steering Committee for Supplier Development, representing results of assigned suppliers.
Conduct on-site supplier assessments, evaluation of production efficiencies, and management of critical supply situations.
Analyze the costs to implement measures, agree upon cost sharing and cost savings sharing between Volkswagen and the supplier.
Monitor improvement plans and KPIs to determine exit criteria for field deployments at suppliers.
Extensive travel within NAR region, often on short notice.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, Business, Manufacturing, Finance or equivalent professional experience in an automotive manufacturing setting. Advanced degree or international studies desired.
